prompt: Design a modern login form interface with a clean green theme. The UI should feature a centered single-column layout with a light green background (Colors.green[50]). At the top, display a 'Welcome Back' heading in a bold, 30px font with a deep green color (Colors.green[800]). Below, include a subtitle 'Sign in to your account' in a 15px font with a medium green color (Colors.green[400]). Add two input fields: an email TextField with a rounded border (BorderRadius.circular(10)), a light gray border (Colors.grey[300]), an email icon prefix (Icons.email), a 'Email' label, and a hint text 'Enter your email'. The password TextField should have matching styling with a lock icon prefix (Icons.lock), a 'Password' label, a hint text 'Enter your password', and a visibility toggle. Both fields should use a green focused border (Colors.green[600]). Include a 'Forgot Password?' link aligned to the right in green (Colors.green[600]) with a 14px font. Add a full-width elevated button for login with a green background (Colors.green[600]), white text, and rounded corners (BorderRadius.circular(10)). At the bottom, include a row with 'Don't have an account?' text in medium green followed by a 'Sign Up' link in deep green. Use 24 pixels padding around the main content and 12 pixels spacing between elements. The form container should have a white background with a subtle shadow (BoxShadow: color Colors.grey[200], blurRadius 10). Ensure the layout is responsive with scrolling support.
